00062 static void draw_curve_knot(float x, float y, float xscale, float yscale, float hsize)
00063 {
00064     static GLuint displist=0;
00065 
00066     /* initialize round circle shape */
00067     if (displist == 0) {
00068         GLUquadricObj *qobj;
00069 
00070         displist = glGenLists(1);
00071         glNewList(displist, GL_COMPILE);
00072 
00073         qobj = gluNewQuadric();
00074         gluQuadricDrawStyle(qobj, GLU_SILHOUETTE);
00075         gluDisk(qobj, 0,  0.7, 8, 1);
00076         gluDeleteQuadric(qobj);
00077 
00078         glEndList();
00079     }
00080 
00081     glPushMatrix();
00082 
00083     glTranslatef(x, y, 0.0f);
00084     glScalef(1.0f/xscale*hsize, 1.0f/yscale*hsize, 1.0f);
00085     glCallList(displist);
00086 
00087     glPopMatrix();
00088 }
00089 
00090 static void draw_graph_cfra(SpaceClip *sc, ARegion *ar, Scene *scene)
00091 {
00092     View2D *v2d = &ar->v2d;
00093     float xscale, yscale;
00094     float vec[2];
00095 
00096     /* Draw a light green line to indicate current frame */
00097     vec[0] = (float)(sc->user.framenr * scene->r.framelen);
00098 
00099     UI_ThemeColor(TH_CFRAME);
00100     glLineWidth(2.0);
00101 
00102     glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00103         vec[1] = v2d->cur.ymin;
00104         glVertex2fv(vec);
00105 
00106         vec[1] = v2d->cur.ymax;
00107         glVertex2fv(vec);
00108     glEnd();
00109 
00110     glLineWidth(1.0);
00111 
00112     UI_view2d_view_orthoSpecial(ar, v2d, 1);
00113 
00114     /* because the frame number text is subject to the same scaling as the contents of the view */
00115     UI_view2d_getscale(v2d, &xscale, &yscale);
00116     glScalef(1.0f/xscale, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00117 
00118     clip_draw_curfra_label(sc, (float)sc->user.framenr * xscale, 18);
00119 
00120     /* restore view transform */
00121     glScalef(xscale, 1.0, 1.0);
00122 }
00123 
00124 static void draw_graph_sfra_efra(Scene *scene, View2D *v2d)
00125 {
00126     UI_view2d_view_ortho(v2d);
00127 
00128     /* currently clip editor supposes that editing clip length is equal to scene frame range */
00129     glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00130     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00131         glColor4f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.4f);
00132 
00133         glRectf(v2d->cur.xmin, v2d->cur.ymin, (float)SFRA, v2d->cur.ymax);
00134         glRectf((float)EFRA, v2d->cur.ymin, v2d->cur.xmax, v2d->cur.ymax);
00135     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00136 
00137     UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BACK, -60);
00138 
00139     /* thin lines where the actual frames are */
00140     fdrawline((float)SFRA, v2d->cur.ymin, (float)SFRA, v2d->cur.ymax);
00141     fdrawline((float)EFRA, v2d->cur.ymin, (float)EFRA, v2d->cur.ymax);
00142 }

00144 static void tracking_segment_point_cb(void *UNUSED(userdata), MovieTrackingTrack *UNUSED(track),
00145             MovieTrackingMarker *marker, int UNUSED(coord), float val)
00146 {
00147     glVertex2f(marker->framenr, val);
00148 }
00149 
00150 void tracking_segment_start_cb(void *userdata, MovieTrackingTrack *track, int coord)
00151 {
00152     static float colors[2][3] = {{1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f},
00153                                  {0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f}};
00154     float col[4];
00155 
00156     copy_v3_v3(col, colors[coord]);
00157 
00158     if (track==userdata) {
00159         col[3] = 1.0f;
00160         glLineWidth(2.0f);
00161     }
00162     else {
00163         col[3] = 0.5f;
00164         glLineWidth(1.0f);
00165     }
00166 
00167     glColor4fv(col);
00168 
00169     glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00170 }
00171 
00172 void tracking_segment_end_cb(void *UNUSED(userdata))
00173 {
00174     glEnd();
00175 
00176     glLineWidth(1.0f);
00177 }
00178 
00179 static void tracking_segment_knot_cb(void *userdata, MovieTrackingTrack *track,
00180             MovieTrackingMarker *marker, int coord, float val)
00181 {
00182     struct { MovieTrackingTrack *act_track; int sel; float xscale, yscale, hsize; } *data = userdata;
00183     int sel= 0, sel_flag;
00184 
00185     if (track != data->act_track)
00186         return;
00187 
00188     sel_flag = coord == 0 ? MARKER_GRAPH_SEL_X : MARKER_GRAPH_SEL_Y;
00189     sel = (marker->flag & sel_flag) ? 1 : 0;
00190 
00191     if (sel == data->sel) {
00192         if (sel)
00193             UI_ThemeColor(TH_HANDLE_VERTEX_SELECT);
00194         else
00195             UI_ThemeColor(TH_HANDLE_VERTEX);
00196 
00197         draw_curve_knot(marker->framenr, val, data->xscale, data->yscale, data->hsize);
00198     }
00199 }
00200 
00201 static void draw_tracks_curves(View2D *v2d, SpaceClip *sc)
00202 {
00203     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00204     MovieTracking *tracking = &clip->tracking;
00205     MovieTrackingTrack *act_track = BKE_tracking_active_track(tracking);
00206     int width, height;
00207     struct { MovieTrackingTrack *act_track; int sel; float xscale, yscale, hsize; } userdata;
00208 
00209     BKE_movieclip_get_size(clip, &sc->user, &width, &height);
00210 
00211     if (!width || !height)
00212         return;
00213 
00214     /* non-selected knot handles */
00215     userdata.hsize = UI_GetThemeValuef(TH_HANDLE_VERTEX_SIZE);
00216     userdata.sel = FALSE;
00217     userdata.act_track = act_track;
00218     UI_view2d_getscale(v2d, &userdata.xscale, &userdata.yscale);
00219     clip_graph_tracking_values_iterate(sc, &userdata, tracking_segment_knot_cb, NULL, NULL);
00220 
00221     /* draw graph lines */
00222     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00223     clip_graph_tracking_values_iterate(sc, act_track, tracking_segment_point_cb, tracking_segment_start_cb, tracking_segment_end_cb);
00224     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00225 
00226     /* selected knot handles on top of curves */
00227     userdata.sel= TRUE;
00228     clip_graph_tracking_values_iterate(sc, &userdata, tracking_segment_knot_cb, NULL, NULL);
00229 }
00230 
00231 static void draw_frame_curves(SpaceClip *sc)
00232 {
00233     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00234     MovieTracking *tracking = &clip->tracking;
00235     MovieTrackingReconstruction *reconstruction = BKE_tracking_get_reconstruction(tracking);
00236     int i, lines = 0, prevfra = 0;
00237 
00238     glColor3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00239 
00240     for (i = 0; i<reconstruction->camnr; i++) {
00241         MovieReconstructedCamera *camera = &reconstruction->cameras[i];
00242 
00243         if (lines && camera->framenr!=prevfra+1) {
00244             glEnd();
00245             lines = 0;
00246         }
00247 
00248         if (!lines) {
00249             glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00250             lines = 1;
00251         }
00252 
00253         glVertex2f(camera->framenr, camera->error);
00254 
00255         prevfra = camera->framenr;
00256     }
00257 
00258     if (lines)
00259         glEnd();
00260 }
00261 
00262 void clip_draw_graph(SpaceClip *sc, ARegion *ar, Scene *scene)
00263 {
00264     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00265     View2D *v2d = &ar->v2d;
00266     View2DGrid *grid;
00267     short unitx = V2D_UNIT_FRAMESCALE, unity = V2D_UNIT_VALUES;
00268 
00269     /* grid */
00270     grid = UI_view2d_grid_calc(scene, v2d, unitx, V2D_GRID_NOCLAMP, unity, V2D_GRID_NOCLAMP, ar->winx, ar->winy);
00271     UI_view2d_grid_draw(v2d, grid, V2D_GRIDLINES_ALL);
00272     UI_view2d_grid_free(grid);
00273 
00274     if (clip) {
00275         if (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_GRAPH_TRACKS)
00276             draw_tracks_curves(v2d, sc);
00277 
00278         if (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_GRAPH_FRAMES)
00279             draw_frame_curves(sc);
00280     }
00281 
00282     /* frame range */
00283     draw_graph_sfra_efra(scene, v2d);
00284 
00285     /* current frame */
00286     draw_graph_cfra(sc, ar, scene);
00287 }
